#Hydra sketch made by Olivia Jack and Flor de fuego

![IMG_20240529_142248_10_004_PureShot](https://github.com/flordefuego/FensterHydraSketch/assets/31332673/2a5be386-e1b6-49fc-b8e6-191fb1c630e4)



link to Hydra Browser version [here](https://hydra.ojack.xyz/?%3D%3D)

```
// pattern!
osc(20, 0.01, 0.3)
	.saturate(5)
	//.thresh(0.5, 0)
	//.rotate(Math.PI / 2)
	.modulateScale(
		osc(6, 0.04)
		//.thresh(0.5, 0.5)
		// noise(2)
		// .modulateScale(osc(4, -0.04).pixelate(10), - 0.9)
		.rotate(Math.PI / 2)
		.pixelate(60, 40)
		.color(1, 1), -0.9, 1)
	// 	.modulate(gradient()
	// 		.color(1)
	// 		.pixelate(1000, 10), 0.4)
	//.scrollY(0.5)
	//.modulateRotate(gradient().pixelate(2, 2), Math.PI*2)
	//.rotate(Math.PI/2)
	//.repeat(2, 1)
	.out()

render(o0)

// mask
gradient()
	.repeat(40, 8, 0.5)
	.hue(0.5).brightness(0.6)
	.mask(osc(12)
		.rotate(() => Math.PI / 2)
		.modulate(noise(2))
		.thresh(0.5, 0).pixelate(150,50))
.mult(osc(4)
			.thresh(0.5,0)
			.modulateScale(
				osc(6, 0.04)
				.rotate(Math.PI / 2)
				.pixelate(60, 40), -0.9, 1))
	.layer(
		src(o0)
		.mask(osc(4)
			.thresh(0.5,0)
			.modulateScale(
				osc(6, 0.04)
				//.thresh(0.5, 0.5)
				// noise(2)
				// .modulateScale(osc(4, -0.04).pixelate(10), - 0.9)
				.rotate(Math.PI / 2)
				.pixelate(60, 40), -0.9, 1))
		//	.mask(src(o0).rotate(-Math.PI/2).scale(3).thresh(0.4))
		//.modulate(src(o0).rotate(-Math.PI/2).scale(2))
		.rotate(Math.PI / 2))
		.modulateScale(osc(20)
			.pixelate(6, 6), -0.6)
  //.rotate(Math.PI / 2)
	.out(o1)

render(o1)


speed = 0.0
```
